channel.title: Shreyas Gupta's PS Journey
channel.description: Recent content on Shreyas Gupta's PS Journey

item.title: Day 7
item.description: At last understood how to deploy a hugo static site using GitHub action after finding CircleCI slightly complicated. Finally deployed my site!!!

item.title: Day 6
item.description: Made a CircleCI account and was learning about CI/CD (Continous integration, Continous Deployment). Tried using CircleCI.

item.title: Day 5
item.description: Was tinkering with Hugo and made my first site and hosted it locally. Basically just figuring out how hugo works.

item.title: Day 4
item.description: Unforntunately was sick since I got the vaccine the previous day and had a very bad fever, so was unable to do any work.

item.title: Day 3
item.description: Installed Linux: Ubuntu ver 20.04. and set it up. Faced some issues with Ubuntu and sorted them while learning about a few terminal commands. Installed asciinema and hugo on the VM. Installed hugo.

item.title: Day 2
item.description: Downloaded hugo which is a website creating tool and experimented on it by creating my first website. Tried downloading asciinema but since Im running windows, was unable to do so. A possible solution as proposed by my mentor was to use a VM with linux. Downloaded Virtualbox, an Oracle VMware and understood how a VM works.

item.title: Day 1
item.description: Installed Git and learnt about version control systems. Learnt about how to write in markdown. Started a repo and committed a markdown page. Pushed an html file but had an issue with deploying a github page which displayed my markdown page as my html file could be viewed. Fixed this issue by first deleting the html file and then launching a github page.

item.title: About
item.description: Hello, I’m Shreyas Gupta. This is the log which is going to be kept by me detailing my work done during my internship at NPBridge Solutions Pvt. Ltd. This internship has been assigned to me by my college: BITS Pilani, Hyderabad Campus. I am majoring in Computer Science and have just finished my second year.
